column4: hi guyz using synaptic i just installed 'awesome' wm but the question is how do i run it now?
tthe gdm/kdm login screen has a menu for sessions
normally to make a usb stick bootable, ive used syslinux, or one of its variants
syslinux is normally used by many of the 'installed-to-usb' linux disrtos. Its documented, and in the syslinux package.
